fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Change the server icon, server name, or the name of any category, or the name of any channel, or the nickname of any player each night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make at least 4 people laugh. *(Someone laughs if they send a Discord message in reaction to the change that is a commonly accepted Internet expression of having found something funny, such as "lmao", "pFFFFFT", or "sdjfsdjisdjfisjdfihhh".)*
